title: OCE RANKED QUE CUT OFF TIME
body:
Please get rid of the 4am cut off, there are hundreds of players wanting to play ranked in the OCE server, it's only fair and OCE has been on trial period long enough, please consider this. Worst case please extend the time till 5am or 6am as a prolonged trial.

thank you

yours kindly.

replies.body: It's not the quantity but the quality of players being the reason for the downtime. Matching bronzies with gold players wouldn't be a good thing.

Also, the wait times would be horrendous. It is already pretty crappy having to wait 10+ minutes to get into a games at 10am (plus all the que dodging that happens before ACTUALLY getting into a game). 

This is also coming from me, someone in bronze, with the highest percentage of players in their tier to be matched up against at any one point in time.
I was thinking the same thing here. I am at uni on most nights and when I get back home I would like to play a game before I go to bed. On a late night I don't get home until 4am which is a shame.

Played a few games just before the cut off (Wednesday morning), only 2-3min queues in bronze/silver, matchmaking seemed fine.  So weird the cut of times, 4am in AU is 6am here in NZ, ranked essentially doesn't come back up till 10am which is really inconvenient.
Even if it does get worse, I would rather have longer queue times or shittier matchmaking than not being able to play at all.
